subject: Attention: Mr. Allan,
body:
Attention: Mr.  Allan,

I was told by my secretary that you are not the right person for the
compensation funds that I kept on your behalf.
Regards
Mark Larry

subject: Re: Attention: Mr. Allan,
body:
Hello Mark Larry,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm sorry to hear that there seems to be some confusion regarding the funds kept on my behalf. Could you please provide me with more information about this situation? I want to make sure everything is in order.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Allan

subject: Re: Attention: Mr. Allan,
body:
We were in business transactions years back where I wanted you to help me
receive a Consignment box for safekeeping under your care.

Due to one thing or the other we couldn't complete the business before I
got a new partner from Germany who helped to execute the deal.  Been your
effort to me i decided to compensate you with the $1, Million Dollars.
which was kept under Dr. Daniel care my Secretary,

I kept your email address in my file all this while that is why I wrote you
for the first time and referred you to Dr.  Daniel, to contact him in other
to help you meet the bank for the release of the money to you,

But if you really know that we haven't been in business transaction before
then you should not waste your time to claim what does not belong to you,

Larry Mark

subject: Re: Attention: Mr. Allan,
body:
Hello Larry Mark,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must admit, I'm a bit confused about the details you mentioned. Could you please provide more information about the business we were involved in years ago? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the situation.

Additionally, could you explain why the money is being kept under Dr. Daniel's care? Is there a specific reason for this arrangement?

I appreciate your offer to compensate me with a million dollars, but before proceeding any further, I would like to gather more information and understand the entire process better. Can you please provide more details about how this compensation would work and what steps need to be taken?

Best wishes,
Allan
